price: Mélòó mélòó nínú àwọn Ànábì tí A ti rán sí àwọn ẹni àkọ́kọ́.
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن نَّبِيّٖ فِي ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wakam arsalnā min nabiyyin fī al-awalīna
